chapter.title: Releasing Red5
chapter.para: This document describes the steps necessary to create a new release of Red5:

listitem.para: Make sure everything has been committed to the trunk or correct branch.
Update the file doc/changelog.txt with informations about the new release.
Create tags of the modules that are linked into the main code tree:

blockquote.para:
documentation at http://red5.googlecode.com/svn/doc/tags
Tags for versions should always be the version string with dots replaced by underscores, e.g. version "1.2.3" becomes tag "1_2_3".

chapter.para: If you would tag the documentation folder for version "1.2.3", you would use the url http://red5.googlecode.com/svn/doc/tags/1_2_3
